dev.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.entities.Entity
      • dev.entities.Player

  • public class Player
extends Entity
    This is the class that defines the player, i.e., the frog.
    It extends the abstract class entity.
    Author:
    Eder Paz ; Neil Blake ; Logan Wedel

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class dev.entities.Entity

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(Game game)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(Game game)
        Defines the player size and initial position on the screen.
        Parameters:
        game - Instance of game so that the player can rely on the game variables.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Checks if one of the keys used to move the player have been pressed and move the player according to it.
        Defines which frog image has to be drawn by the render() method the movement done as well.
        Specified by:
        tick in class Entity

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws the player on the screen according to its x and y position and the respective image according
        to it movement defined by the tick() method.
        Specified by:
        render in class Entity
        Parameters:
        g - Graphic object used to draw the images.

      • setScore

        Setter for the player score.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
